snippet: Nelson Mandela, the former South African president, is responding “satisfactorily” to treatment for pneumonia, doctors said.
abstract: South African government says former Pres Nelson Mandela's health is improving after nearly a week in hospital being treated for pneumonia.
lead_paragraph: Nelson Mandela, the former South African president, is responding “satisfactorily” to treatment for pneumonia, doctors said.

headline.seo: Mandela Said to Be ‘Much Better’ Than Last Week
headline.main: Mandela Said to Be ‘Much Better’ Than a Week Ago
